title: january 12: a last refusal
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the last time that the house of representatives refused to grant women suffrage. Then she talks about a Vampire Weekend release and an ensuing lawsuit! Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
